name: Pong (itch) (dronkowitz28)
description:
Run Program using Pycharm. Be sure to have Python 3 installed on your computer

How to play: press up or down arrows to move the right paddle

press w or s to move the left paddle

if the paddles go out of bounds player a or player b scores 1 point

once a player reaches 10 points they will win the game

the window will close automatically after a few seconds when the player wins
